QuestData.Title: Invasion Point: Cataclysm
QuestData.Description: Now that we have access to the Legion's base at Invasion Point: Cataclysm, we need to figure out a way to shut down their operations there. Shadowmoon Village won't be safe until the Legion's presence is erased from the valley.$B$BI've sent an advance party up to the invasion point to help you formulate a plan to destroy the Legion's supplies. Go back to Legion Hold and step into the teleporter with the green crystals above it. Nakansi will meet you at your destination.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Nakansi at Invasion Point: Cataclysm.
QuestData.RewardText: You must be the $R Blood Guard Gulmok told me to expect. I have a plan in mind, but I'll need your help to complete the preparations.
